 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כַּרְכֹּם‎</span> **noun [masculine]** ==saffron== (***crocus sativus***) (Late Hebrew ***id.***; and ***verb denominative*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כִּרְכֵּם‎</span>; Hithpa\`el ***grow yellow, pale***; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎כּוּרְכְּמָא‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> = <span class="bdbLangGreek">κρόκος</span>, ***crocus***; [[BDB#Lag|Lag]]<sup>Ges. Abh. 58, No. 147</sup>; so also JHMordt<sup>sab Denkm. 83 f.</sup>; otherwise [[BDB#DHM|DHM]]<sup>ib.</sup>, who compare Sabean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כמכם‎</span>, Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> = Greek <span class="bdbLangGreek">κάγκαμον</span>); — [[Song.4.14|Song 4:14]] on meaning see especially [[BDB#Löw|Löw]]<sup>No. 162</sup>.
